cast.overview: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places. Mitsuha wakes up in Taki’s body, and he in hers. This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.
cast.title: Your Name.

details.biography: Baron Yamazaki (バロン 山崎, Baron Yamazaki, born August 5, 1971) is a Japanese narrator, radio personality, and voice actor from Ibaraki Prefecture. He has business partnerships with two companies, Dana Works and Voicegarage, and is mainly active as a freelancer. He was formerly affiliated with Flip Up and SO Promotion. His real name and former stage name is Takeshi Yamazaki (山崎 剛, Yamazaki Takehsi).
details.name: Baron Yamazaki
